name: Glitch Mania
description:
You are living in a beach house and there is a forest near you. There are hordes of tree nuisances and foxes running towards your home! They are glitches in the environment. You are an experienced magician so you try and stop this. Spawn gnomes, cacti and more. There is a huge amount of tuning you can do for the difficulty. Try and make your own strategies! This game is meant for anyone who likes goofy music and strategy.

And don't forget, always keep trying to beat the level.

Instructions:

This game is meant to be played on full screen mode.

Please click on start before free-play as start teaches you how to play the game.

Please spawn defenders by clicking on their icon in the bottom bar and click on the grass.

If you want to exit from the game, you need to go to the previous page on the left pointing arrow on your browser.
